item.title: Virtual Professional Learning – International
item.dc:creator: Tiffani LeClair
item.description:
Discover the professional learning opportunities available to our international partners. Dive deep into MAP Growth reports and data or let our expert facilitators tailor a consultation to meet your needs.

item.content:encoded:
Discover the professional learning opportunities available to our international partners. Dive deep into MAP Growth reports and data or let our expert facilitators tailor a consultation to meet your needs. These six virtual sessions are convenient options for small groups wherever you are located.

item.title: International school effectively implements MAP—and sees student growth
item.dc:creator: Tiffani LeClair
item.description:
School leaders at the New Academy School in Dubai, United Arab Emirates, were seeking an assessment to measure growth and to compare student performance to students in the United States,

The post International school effectively implements MAP—and sees student growth appeared first on NWEA.
item.content:encoded:
School leaders at the New Academy School in Dubai, United Arab Emirates, were seeking an assessment to measure growth and to compare student performance to students in the United States, as well as to provide critical data points for their accreditation. New Academy found their solution to all those tasks in the MAP Growth assessment. Read how an international school with a significant portion of English Language Learners successfully introduced MAP Growth to teachers, students, and parents.

The post International school effectively implements MAP—and sees student growth appeared first on NWEA.
